attributes.additional_details:
To consider the health & safety of the school community and as such to include day‐to‐day activities such as walking children to and from school, by banning all dogs from school grounds. this is to include that dogs are not allowed to be tied up and/or left unattended near school access/exit points of grounds.
Some find the presence of dogs in the playground and school grounds stressful, even frightening, particularly with younger children, and even well behaved dogs can behave unpredictably when placed in a noisy and crowded environment.
